__TOC__

* To create an awareness about Ubuntu-MY Community, Kamaruddin Mahmood came out with Ubuntu-MY Official 2012 Shirt available in Black and White color with Ubuntu-MY logos and link printed on the shirt. The shirt has been re-printed by MFauzirahman due to high demand from Ubuntu-MY community members. 
* The idea are the same as ubuntu release t-shirt, to make people aware about Ubuntu-MY community and it's website when they saw any members wearing the shirt on any occasion.
* The shirt design are acquired through a contest, <nowiki>[[http://forums.ubuntu.com.my/viewtopic.php?f=6&t=2465 | Ubuntu-MY 2012 Official T-Shirt Design Competition in forums.ubuntu.com.my]]</nowiki> and its also been announce via <nowiki>[[https://www.facebook.com/groups/ubuntumy/permalink/10150660712996873/ | Ubuntu-MY facebook group]]</nowiki>
